resources.string: This demo app uses Socket Mobile\'s Capture SDK. As part of the SDK, the source code is available for adaptation per your business under the Socket Mobile terms and agreements.\n\n
Connect your Socket scanner in Application Mode (with Socket Mobile Companion app)
Start scanning item barcode to your text file. Quantity (default as 1) will be automatically added for each scan
Change scan settings to fit your need"
In order to connect to your Socket Mobile scanner in Stock Count app, you need to install and run Socket Mobile Companion app from Google Play Store.
